반응속도 테스트 is a quick and engaging online activity designed to measure your response time. In this test, users are prompted to click or tap on the screen at specific intervals, typically indicated by color changes or visual cues. The test begins with a "waiting" phase, transitions to a "ready" state, and then prompts the user to click during the "now" phase.

The test aims to evaluate how rapidly individuals can react to changing stimuli. Participants click or tap as soon as the screen shifts, and the test records the time it takes from the initiation signal to the user's response. The outcome is usually displayed in milliseconds, providing a numerical representation of the user's reaction time.
